name: System Shutdown (DAE Studios)
description:
Your teacher is hiding something... Dive into his computer and discover dark secrets that should never see the light of day!

  • Arcade feel gameplay;
  •  Exploring the computer in a video game setting;
  •  Visualizing the computer in an appealing art style;
  •  The deep, morbid storyline about the dark secrets of a teacher;

System Shutdown team: 

  • Christian Fedrau
  • Dylan Millian
  • Tinca Antohi
